statement.text: A target FICO<sup>®</sup> Score 8 of 796 could be met within 6 months with the following actions:

actions.text: Pay down $120 of your total revolving/open account balances of $1,308 every month for 6 months.
Pay all your bills on time for 6 months.
Do not open any new accounts, so that the time since your most recently opened account ages to 1 year.
Do not open any new accounts, so that your average length of established history ages to 3 years, 5 months.
Continue to make your monthly installment loan payments on time to reduce the total installment loan balances of $13,834 you owe.
Do not apply for any new credit.
